headline: 40 Percent of House Republicans Who Voted to Impeach Trump to Exit Congress, Fred Upton the Latest

Rep. Fred Upton (R-MI) on Tuesday announced his exit from Congress, notching up a 40-percent exit rate among House Republicans who voted to impeach Donald Trump.

Additional pro-impeachment Republicans may also not make it to the November midterms.
Upton joins three other pro-impeachment Republicans to forgo running for reelection.
Both Huizenga and Upton were running for the same seat due to state redistricting.
